title: Chairman Mao gives us a happy life (Chinese poster, 1954)
Text:: Chairman Mao gives us a happy life.Year  March 1954.Publisher  Sanyi Printing Company.Artist  Xin Liliang.Additional information  The poster depicts a happy domestic scene around the dinner table, with a large portrait of Mao hanging behind. It was one of many designed by Xin Liliang for the Shanghai-based ‘Sanyi Printing Company’ in the early 1950s, depicting happy scenes at work and home.
